categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Armx was a modified MerenData RM-2020 espionage droid turned bounty hunter known for his poetry, who often wrote epitaphs for his acquisitions. On one occasion he wrote such an epitaph about his capture of the target Gavron Noff.
Armx was originally assigned to an Imperial Naval base on Gestrex III before it was destroyed by forces of the Rebel Alliance.
